long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify emogif uploding for Slack.

emogif (https://zeek0x.github.io/emogif/) is a web application that allows you to crop an animated gif from your local mp4 file by specifying the parameters (position, size, time, FPS, and resolution) via GUI.

By adding the emogif-extension to your chrome web app, a widget will be added to emogif page.

Pages other than emogif are unaffected.

By using that widget, you can instantly add a cropped animated gif to the Slack workspace where you are logged in.
